idea: Saathealth’s AI algorithms, developed from analyses of more than 15 million health consumer data points, personalize digital health interventions for health consumers. These algorithms allow us to • Predict user churn on digital health platforms • Provide AI powered recommendations to health consumers to increase digital intervention engagement.• Tailor adaptive, personalized experiences to health users digital phenotypesSaathealth’s AI algorithms allows health organizations to augment digital health engagement with health content and transactions, optimize marketing spends and increase the user lifetime engagement and value. Our algorithms can be deployed with our companion solution that enables personalized, precision digital health interventions. The digital companion platform is built on the foundation of 8 independent modules that power the user experience. The platform is indication and geography agnostic, providing users a personalized, gamified behavior change learning journey. Users can redeem earned points for a variety of non-financial and financial incentives that drive positive behavioral shifts towards the pre-identified outcomes. Our AI algorithms and digital companion solutions are already being developed for diverse use cases such as children’s health, family health, chronic diseases, neuropsychiatry disorders and health worker training.
name: SWAPNADARSHAK HEALTH PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
We have started this company as Reseller on online marketplaces as well as we are in the process of launching our own e-commerce website.


Right now we are having 4 vendors providing various products to sell online. We need funding for Marketing, inventory, and administration.
name: KITOTKARA CONSULTANTS LLP

idea:
Quality Policy:
We at Golden Jury Our dedicate ourselves to provide high quality film festival and events which add values to the film maker and all the stakeholders. Quality Policy of “Golden Jury” specifies the Degree of Excellence as “all activities of the organization will be carried out in a systematic manner in accordance with defined and documented Policies and Procedures, will meet applicable legislative requirements, will be visible and auditable, and will ensure that the needs & expectation of Filmmaker, Staff and Stakeholders are met.
We realize that Quality is the responsibility of all personnel, and therefore will promote a Quality Culture within the organization by means of sharing information, including personnel in decision making and delegating specific Quality Management functions, e.g. Quality System maintenance, to suitably skilled and competent persons.
Where deficiencies are found, related to the operation of the QMS, corrective and preventative action will be taken to ensure continual improvement of TP policies and procedures. The Quality system has the full commitment of Management.
name: GOLDEN JURY FILM ACADEMY PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Do you keep skipping your due dates and are hassled with your invoice management? Well, you can end your worry here. Bill OK helps you create and manage invoices online. You can see all invoices in one place right in front of you.

Bill OK reminds you when your invoice is due. You can also use it to systemize a schedule of when you want Bill OK to remind you of the due dates. It allows you to send, accept, receive, and reject invoices. Bill OK also makes sharing of the invoices effortless.

You can land your invoices by sharing a link via SMS or WhatsApp messages. Bill OK is quick, easy, and reliable to use.
name: CLOUD ACCOUNTING PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We at ImmaculateBites Pvt LTD are trying to disrupt the packaged snacking industry in India by coming up with food products which are high on both health and taste. Our core ideology is to unjunk the snacking behavior through better for you products which are going to improve consumers' lives.
name: IMMACULATEBITES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: WE BELIEVE IN CURATING EVENTS THAT BRINGS MORE VALUE AND LIFE TO THE LIVES OF PEOPLE, EXPERIENCES THAT ENRICH THEIR LIVES WITH UNTOUCHED AREAS OF KNOWLEDGE ARTS FASHION CULTURE AND ENTERTAINMENT.
name: RUDRAA INITIATIVES MEDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We are a social service based philanthropic startup. We act as an intermediary between scrap collectors and customers. We collect newspapers and other scrap materials from households and sell them to recycling organisations and donate the proceeds to NGO's. We have started operations in our area and plan to launch an app in the future. We also have many different ideas as to how we can move forward with this business.
name: UnWaste It

idea: We are a health-tech startup with vision of helping solve some of the major healthcare challenges in India. Enabling the Indian healthcare industry with various innovative technology products and solutions  We actively work with the leaders in the healthcare industry for understanding their challenges and to build suitable products that can be scaled across India.
name: BUZZFIND TECH PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Omic is a healthcare technology company focused on patient management and treatment outcomes. Our primary objective is to provide clinicians and patients with the necessary tools to digitize and organize their healthcare data for better health outcomes.
The foundation of robust healthcare delivery lies in the data we create today. Moving towards predictable, personalized and preventive healthcare. This starts with optimizing doctor-patient communication followed by data driven personalized treatment regimens and eventually stepping into an era of dynamically evolving evidence-based medicine.
We are building an engine that fuels such a vision.
name: OMIC HEALTHCARE LLP
